Write-Up Text: People on social media have been engaging in discussions surrounding various issues concerning welfare and the Australian budget. There's been considerable noise about the impact of cost of living pressure on Australians and the efforts reportedly made in the budget to alleviate poverty. However some users expressed their concerns about how politics allowed so many Australians to struggle in the first place. There were also discussions about the unexpected cost of the wage increase granted to aged care workers while some users complained about what they consider to be inadequate social security increases. Some people praised the coverage offered by @abc730 on some welfare issues while others expressed concern about the government's lack of funding for environmental protection and wildlife conservation efforts.
